name: Carnight
description:
In this game, you have the choice between three bonuses to start with :

- A bonus life

- Speed

- x2 Points

The points are useless at the moment, I will add a utility in the future.

You can slow down by pressing the down arrow.

Discord : https://discord.gg/jxpebFAJNu

YouTube : https://www.youtube.com/@Lampsi-Online
